property.name: ipAddress
property.description: IP address of the remote device

property.name: username
property.description: username to login to switch managment console

property.name: password
property.description: password to login to switch managment console

property.name: Protocol
property.description: protocol to login to switch managment console: SSH or Telnet, SSH used by default

property.name: SSH Port
property.description: port for SSH connection, 22022 used by default

property.name: Telnet Port
property.description: port for telnet connection, 53058 used by default
